sentences.sentence: Thousands of actors joined writer's strike in first joint action in decades, shutting down the entertainment industry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Acropolis in Athens was temporarily closed to visitors on Friday as temperatures soared across southern Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The ancient monument is one of the most popular landmarks in Greece, attracting visitors from around the world.

sentences.sentence: And, I mean, we're only here once in a lifetime, so why not?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The heat was awful, but it was worth the view, for sure. Ήταν πολύ ωραία. Δεν σας άρεσε η θερμοκρασία. Η θερμοκρασία ήταν τρομερή, αλλά ήταν σημαντική.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Σίγουρα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Η Ρεδ Κρόσ αφήνεται νερό και πρώτη βάση σε άλλους επισκέπτες που ασκούνται για την κατάσταση των θερμοκρασίων που προχωρούν στις 40°C.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Είχαμε αρκετά περιστατικά σήμερα, λιποθυμίες, ζαλάδες.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Αυτά καταλαβαίνετε είναι γιατί και οι ίδιοι δεν προσέχουν λίγο τον εαυτό τους.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Δεν φοράνε καπέλο που είναι πάρα πολύ βασικό αυτές τις μέρες.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Δεν πρέπει να βγαίνουμε έξω χωρίς να φοράμε το καπέλο μας και φυσικά να πίνουμε πολλούς χυμούς και νερά.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Μόλις έκλεισε η Ακρόπολη λόγω των υψηλών θερμοκρασία.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Τεμπλότητες στην Ελλάδα μπορούν να πίνουμε πάρα πολύ νερό, είναι το πιο βασικό. Να κάνουμε κάποιο όπως κάνουν οι αθλητές στα cool breaks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Τεμπετρικές θερμοκρασίες μπορούν να μείνουν μεγάλα, όπως και μια άλλη θερμοκρασία που θα εξακολουθεί την επόμενη εβδομάδα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Τα χιλιάδια αστυνομικών πρόσφυγων πηγήθηκαν στους δρόμους του Παρισίου το Βασίλειο, ως μέρος της τεχνικής Παραδοσίας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Το 14 Ιουλίου πηγήθηκε η αρχή της 1789ης Φρενκικής Ρεβολουσίας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: the all-day parade. July 14 marks the start of the 1789 French Revolution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi was the guest of honor at this year's celebration, as French President Emmanuel Macron looked to strengthen ties with India on a range of issues, including climate change, military sales, and countering China's growing influence in the Indo-Pacific region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: China's growing influence in the Indo-Pacific region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some 240 Indian troops led the parade down the Champs-Élysées, and French-made Indian warplanes joined the aerial display.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This year, Bastille Day comes in the wake of the nation's most serious rioting in more than a decade, after the fatal shooting of a 17-year-old last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: rioting in more than a decade after the fatal shooting of a 17-year-old last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More than 100,000 police have been deployed around the country to deter further unrest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: U.S. actors and screenwriters have joined forces in the strike over pay and the threat of artificial intelligence to their jobs. They staged noisy protests outside the headquarters of film, TV and streaming companies, including HBO, Amazon and Netflix.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Screen Actors Guild, representing around 160,000 movie and television actors, called the strike after last-ditch talks with studios ended without a deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hollywood corporates say they have offered historic pay rises and a proposal on the impact of AI.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Former Manchester City footballer Benjamin Mendy

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: has been found not guilty of raping a woman and attempting to rape another.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Just five months earlier, he was acquitted of six other rape charges and one count of sexual assault.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The allegations arose from parties at Mendy's home near the British city of Manchester.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The French footballer has denied the charges and said the incidents were consensual encounters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Mendy's lawyer says that the 28-year-old now wants to rebuild his life.
